title: Clothes Care Center, Fitness Studio, Covered Parking*, Bookshelves*
map_address: 5608 Bellaire Dr. S. near Bryant Irvin
posting_body: ['Welcome Home to Greenwood Creek', 'Luxury, beauty, and convenience in the city you love, get It all at Greenwood Creek Apartments!', 'Situated in the Fort Worth suburb of Benbrook, our elegant, gated apartment community is designed for impressive comfort, style, and fun.', 'Cool off at the swimming pool and play a game of water volleyball Relax on the sundeck or in the spa, or get in a workout at the fitness center.', 'Spend time with friends and family at our BBQ area.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 28', 'OR Text', '28', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team directly.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 968 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Creek View*', '- DR- Backsplash*', '- Almond/White Appliances*', '- 1st Floor*', '- Bookshelves*', '- DR-Cabinet Fronts*', '- Custom Closet*', '- DR- Black Appliances*', '- DR- L1 Upgrade Kit*', '- Covered Parking*', '*In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Online Maintenance Requests', '- Fitness Studio', '- Creek & Wooded Views', '- New Online Services', '- Outdoor Kitchens', '- Cyber Cafe', '- Package Receiving', '- Clothes Care Center', '- Limited Access Gate', '- Lease Free Dog Park', '- Sparkling Swimming Pool', '- Hot Tub', '- New Pool Lounge Area', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome up to 2 pets (cats/dogs) per apartment home.', 'Pet fee is $300 (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet deposit is $87.50 (non-refundable) per pet.', 'Pet rent is $20 per pet.', 'Please give us call for additional pet details.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Greenwood Creek', '5608 Bellaire Dr. S., Benbrook, TX, 76109', '75akIPz4Edrf']
